alert.note: Alert for Southern Black Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 4:31PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Custer County through 500 PM MDT... At 431 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles southeast of Jewel Cave National Monument, or 7 miles southwest of Custer, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea to half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Custer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
